activities.details: Start at Café Frischhut (Prälat-Zistl-Straße 8, 80331 München). Enjoy traditional Bavarian pastries and coffee. Then walk to Man Versus Machine (Müllerstraße 23, 80469 München) for specialty coffee with a modern vibe.
Visit English Garden (München). Explore walking trails and enjoy a picnic.
End the day at Sweet Spot Kaffee (Heiliggeiststraße 1, 80331 München). Relax with artisan coffee in a cozy atmosphere.
Start at Nymphenburg Palace and Gardens (Schloß Nymphenburg 1, 80638 München). Walk through the stunning gardens and admire the palace architecture.
Walk along the Isar River (Wittelsbacherstraße 2b, 80469 München). Scenic paths perfect for a leisurely stroll.
Explore Olympiapark (Spiridon-Louis-Ring 21, 80809 München). Enjoy panoramic views and relax by the lake.
Visit Viktualienmarkt (München-Altstadt-Lehel). Explore the lively outdoor market and try local delicacies.
Return to favorite coffee shops or explore new ones like Café Tambosi.
Flexible time for shopping or indoor activities based on weather conditions.

weather_advice.summary: Rainy weather expected for all three days with temperatures around 16.95°C.
weather_advice.clothing: Wear waterproof clothing, comfortable walking shoes, and carry an umbrella or raincoat.
weather_advice.activity_adjustments: Consider indoor activities or shopping as alternatives if rain persists.

transportation_advice: Walking is feasible for all planned locations. Use Google Maps or local guides for walking routes.
clothing_advice: Comfortable walking shoes, waterproof jackets, and layered clothing are recommended.

attraction_ratings_reviews.Olympiapark: Great for panoramic views and relaxation.
